@graph.name: OSHA First Aid and PPE Kits for Workplace Safety

itemListElement.name: Rapid Care OSHA First Aid Kit
itemListElement.description: A fully stocked kit ideal for OSHA compliance in small to medium workplaces.

itemListElement.name: 3M PPE Essentials Starter Kit
itemListElement.description: PPE kit featuring trusted 3M protection gear for general jobsite safety.

itemListElement.name: First Aid Only 50-Person ANSI/OSHA Kit
itemListElement.description: Comprehensive first aid cabinet for medium-to-large teams.

itemListElement.name: Medique Personal Protection Kit

itemListElement.name: North by Honeywell Industrial First Aid Kit
itemListElement.description: Heavy-duty kit built for high-risk job sites like factories and plants.

mainEntity.name: Are these first aid kits OSHA compliant?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — all listed kits meet or exceed OSHA 1910.151(b) and/or ANSI Z308.1-2015 requirements depending on the product.

mainEntity.name: How do I know which kit size is right for my workplace?

acceptedAnswer.text: OSHA recommends choosing kits based on the number of employees and risk level; smaller kits suit up to 25 people, while larger cabinets cover up to 50 or more.

mainEntity.name: Do these PPE kits include everything for COVID or chemical safety?

acceptedAnswer.text: Basic PPE kits focus on respiratory and contact protection, but for chemical or pandemic-level safety, you may need specialized gear not included in standard kits.
